text_block_list.text:
(The prestigious school, Tracen Academy, 
is a place where nothing but prodigies gather)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(Uma Musume born with overwhelming sense. Uma Musume 
who pursue nothing more than running. Uma Musume 
who continue to climb higher and higher.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I… in this place, is there anything that I can become…?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: ( -Then, one day. A fateful day)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky pulls farther and farther ahead! She increases the 
separation by 3 length, 4 lengths, - She's as strong as expected!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: Fufuu, here I gooo!
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
Can this even be called a mock race?! Here she shows us her 
overwhelming strength! Maruzensky - Now, crosses the goal!!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
(Passing by like a flash of light… my world, 
for the first time began to shine.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Several months later
Haa, haa, haa, haa~…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
One morning, while I was taking a walk, I spotted some Uma Musume 
doing some light early morning training.

Good work. Your form was perfect! But that last 400m, your pace 
dropped below what your target was, didn't it?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
I thought so, maybe I set my pace goal a bit too high. I should 
probably wait until I improve my cardiopulmonary a bit more.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Alright, tomorrow I'll return to my normal pace, 
and try to gradually get accustomed to it!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Fufu, Yes. That sounds like a good idea. At any rate… This is 
my own opinion, but lately, I think you've made big improvements.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, thank you very much. But really, as you said, 
lately I feel like I've really gotten better…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
At this rate, if I keep working hard, s-someday… 
I-I might get to have a match with Maruzensky~… just kidding.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Juuuust kidding! Ahaha, sorry!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
No, I think that's a wonderful dream. …Oh, looks like it's 
almost breakfast. Chiyono O-san, how about you…?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Ah, there's still a little bit left on today's menu, I'll go as 
soon as I'm done! Thank you very much, Ardan-san!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Think nothing of it. 
Well then, I'll be off first.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Allllright, remaining on the menu is…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
And like that, while mumbling, she enthusiastically wrote in her 
notebook. I ended up watching her, just like that-

Trainer-san. See that girl there? Her name's Sakura 
Chiyono O. Today she's together with a friend, but 
normally she's working hard by herself.
text_block_list.name: Maintenance Staff

text_block_list.text:
I've lost count of how many slope dashes she's done. She doesn't 
do anything flashy, but she's here every morning running, and 
analyzing every little bit like that.
text_block_list.name: Maintenance Staff

text_block_list.text:
Through trial and error, she's slowly getting faster, and 
growing. Well, in short… if you're of a mind to, would you 
please consider scouting her?
text_block_list.name: Maintenance Staff
choice_data_list: <size=42>You see her quite favorably, don't you?</size>

text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! I suppose that's true. Wonder if it's because 
I see her every morning. Seeing her giving her best 
today too, makes me feel lively as well.
text_block_list.name: Maintenance Staff

text_block_list.text:
…Fu-, the weather's great and feels nice~. 
… Ah, I've got it!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
"The morning sun, is the most important ingredient 
for an Uma Musume's growth!" Fuu fuu fuu, brilliant 
words if I do say so myself!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: And, at that moment!
Kyaa!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
A sudden gust of wind sent her notebook flying, and it landed 
next to my feet. I got a glimpse of the contents, and it was 
densely packed with writing.

M-my Chiyo-Note…! 
Sorry! Thank you very much!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Ah, um- I wrote in a bunch of things that have happened in my 
life! It's something like that so I call it the Chiyo-Note…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
The things I was taught, the things I came to understand, 
and the proverbs that I thought of are put down in ink in there.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
No no, I'm not such an amazing Uma Musume! At the very least, I 
feel like I just want to do all the things that I can.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: A few days after that-

Ever since I've transferred here, I've liked you! 
I fell in love at first sight with your running form!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
A blushing Sakura Chiyono O. She was holding a letter in her 
hands. The mood seemed serious so I hid without thinking.

Someday, someday I want to be able to stand by 
your side! That's my dream! That's why, one step 
at a time, I want to get closer to you-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Someone like me, is still far from being worthy of you, I 
understand that! But, but… please, give me a chance!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Please, do some parallel running with me, Maruzen-san!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
… Maybe, I should be more specific about what I like about 
Maruzen-san's running? But, no, that might bother h-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
I poked my head out to get a better look, but only 
Sakura Chiyono O was there. I was dumbfounded by 
what I saw, and that's when our eyes met.
D-did you hear all that?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Ah, ah, ah… waaaa~! Please forget everythiiiiiiing!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
